sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_next_collectuser(collectid, fundcode, userid, createtime, collectstate) VALUES (#collectid#, #fundCode#, #userid#, #createTime#, #collectState#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM t_next_collectuser WHERE userid = #userid# AND collectid = #collectid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM t_next_collectuser WHERE userid = #userid# AND collectid = #collectid#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM t_next_collectuser WHERE userid = #userid# AND fundcode = #fundCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM t_next_collectuser WHERE userid = #userid# AND fundcode = #fundCode#
